onActionSaveAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.AddApptController
This method inserts the appointment to the "appointments" table in the MySql DB.
onActionSaveAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.UpdateApptController
This method submits the appointment, checking for completed fields, overlapping appointments, appointment time within business hours If okay, updates appointment in the DB.
onActionSelectContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.ReportsController
This method populates the tableview based on the contact combo selection.

This method inserts the customer to the "customers" table in the MySql DB.
onActionSubmit(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method submits the customer, checking for input errors/ fields not completed.
onActionUpdateAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.ApptMainController
This method opens the Update Appointment screen and sends the selected appointments data to next screen.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class AppSch.Controller.CustomerMainController
This method opens the Update Customer screen and sends the selected customers data to next screen.

This method sets the Division combo box depending on the country selected.
